Package src.controller

Class ShowtimeManager

java.lang.Object
src.controller.ShowtimeManager
public class ShowtimeManager extends Object
ShowtimeManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - CineplexAppView and ShowtimeView and the model class - Showtime.
Since:
2022-10-31

      protected static void displayShowtime(ArrayList<Showtime> showtimes, String from)
      Display list of Showtime for different routes
      Parameters:
      showtimes - list of showtimes to display
      from - route it came from ("" indicates it should display all showtime)

    • onCreateShowtime

      public static boolean onCreateShowtime()
      Action function to run on create Showtime
      Returns:
      boolean true if showtime was created, false otherwise

    • getShowtime

      protected static ArrayList<Showtime> getShowtime(String type)
      Get Showtime according to specified type
      Parameters:
      type - "all" to get all showtimes, "bookable" to get showtimes that are bookable by MovieGoer
      Returns:
      ArrayList<Showtime> of Showtime
